Text:
Thanks for the cycle! But i have a strange problem.

I have iPad 2 iOS 5.1.1 with JB and downloaded JeppFD from the AppStore.

I copied the files to the required place and I can see all airports in the list. However I get the following error when I select any airport: 'The requested chart is not in the library. Contact Jeppesen Technical Support'.

I get this error when I install any older cycle, not just VFR but full world. Enroute charts are working but I get the same error for any terminal chart. 

I tried to reinstall and set back the iPad clock to the past without success :( any idea? thanks!
Anyone knows anything about jeppview 1219 for PC?? thks

It seems everybody must have an Ipad, OK but any idea where to find cycle for PC?

Tks in advance
